name: Just Jump (itch) (rt.7x6)
description:
This is a very simple game with 10 levels that progressively get harder. With in game effects that give the game a dream like feel, paired with elevator music and a  CSGO like parkour system, you're sure to have not a fun time, but a chill time :)

Created With: C#, Unity
Download Size: 123MB
Estimated Game Length: 30min - 60min

*For download, copy and paste the link below into your browser, it will guide you to my website where i have the game available for download :) (I couldnt get this page to work)*
